item.description: Train vs Pedestrian - FATALITY ; INC#1164; 05:25PM; 12201 W Sherman Wy; MAP: https://bit.ly/3FZs14M; North Hollywood; Firefighter have determined death for what appears to be an adult female victim struck by train. There are no injuries reported aboard the train. Metro link tracks are closed. The 9-1-1 call was received at 5:01Pm. All further questions are referred to LAPD Inc # 3107 , LA County Sheriff and LA County Coroner for the investigation. ; FS 89; Batt 14; Valley Bureau; Council District 2; BC14 E102 E260 E289 E89 EM14 HR3 RA39 RA81 T60 T89 UR88; CH8; 17; Margaret Stewart

Hiker Rescue; INC#0968; 03:22PM; 2000 N Fuller Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3jCRSbr; Hollywood Hills West; Firefighters located a male hiker (age unknown) and LAFD Air Ops did a hoist operation to safely bring the patient to ground (he was approximately 200' down an embankment). He is declining transport to the hospital. The helicopter will land and transfer care to the firefighter/paramedics. The 9-1-1 call was received at 2:30PM. No further details. ; FS 41; Batt 5; West Bureau; Council District 4; BC5 E227 E27 E41 H1 H2 HA1 HA2 RA41 RA827 RH114 T27 UR27; CH7; 14; Margaret Stewart

Chemical Spill; INC#0940; 02:16PM; 7320 N Woodlake Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3IcgDoT; West Hills; A small amount of mercury spilled (reported to be on the floor and wall) in one room in a medical facility. There were no persons exposed to the mercury. Out of an abundance of caution, the building is being evacuated to ensure the HVAC system does not created a hazard. There are no medical complaints at this time. The facility performs procedures and has (number unknown) patients recovering from anesthesia etc. No further details.; FS 106; Batt 17; Valley Bureau; Council District 12; BC17 E287 E305 JT1 JT3 RA87 SQ87 T105 T87; CH8; 18; Margaret Stewart

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0873; 02:05PM; 7850 N Balboa Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3G2I9SX; Van Nuys; KNOCKDOWN: 76 firefighters extinguished the fire in 36 minutes with no injuries reported. The fire destroyed the unit of origin and the extent of damage to the adjacent units is being determined. The exposed mobile home / RVs were defended from damage. LAFD Arson section is responding for the investigation. Traffic will remain heavily impacted on Balboa from Stagg to Saticoy due to hose lines and apparatus. Please continue to avoid the area. No further details.; FS 90; Batt 10; Valley Bureau; Council District 6; AR25 AR33 AR7 BC10 BC14 BC15 BC17 CM40 CM42 E100 E105 E205 E273 E287 E288 E289 E290 E89 E90 EA1 EM17 EM9 HR3 RA100 RA87 RA90 T5 T73 T87 T88 T89 T90 UR88 UR89; CH9; 13 17 18; Margaret Stewart

Update Structure Fire; INC#0873; 01:43PM; 7850 N Balboa Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3G2I9SX; Van Nuys; Firefighters are initiating an offensive operation. There are multiple businesses housed within the structure and firefighters are conducting an interior fire attack while the truck companies are going to the roof of the attached but not involved units. There is a mobile home park to the south (Delta side) which is exposed to the fire.; FS 90; Batt 10; Valley Bureau; Council District 6; BC10 BC17 CM40 CM42 E100 E105 E287 E288 E289 E290 E90 EM17 RA90 T87 T88 T89 T90; CH9; 17; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#0873; 01:29PM; 7850 N Balboa Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3G2I9SX; Van Nuys; One story, commercial building (clothing business) with fire showing through the roof. There are other buildings (details not available at this time) exposed. Two additional task forces requested.; FS 90; Batt 10; Valley Bureau; Council District 6; BC10 E105 E290 E90 RA90 T90; CH9; 17; Margaret Stewart

Update Structure Fire; INC#0593; 10:58AM; 1832 S Arlington Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3PZWMv5; Arlington Heights; Patient Update: Upon conducting a thorough search of the crawlspace and both floors of the home, one patient (34 yo F) and is being transported in grave condition. No other patients located.; FS 26; Batt 11; Central Bureau; Council District 10; BC11 BC18 CM20 CM22 E15 E211 E215 E226 E229 E26 E34 E68 EM11 RA11 RA34 SQ21 T11 T15 T26 T29; CH7; 13; Margaret Stewart

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0593; 10:46AM; 1832 S Arlington Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3PZWMv5; Arlington Heights; KNOCKDOWN: The initial assignment of 24 firefighters extinguished the fire in 18 minutes. The fire was contained to the first floor and there are no injuries reported. No further details.; FS 26; Batt 11; Central Bureau; Council District 10; BC11 BC18 CM20 CM22 E15 E211 E215 E226 E229 E26 E34 E68 EM11 RA11 RA34 SQ21 T11 T15 T26 T29; CH9; 13; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#0593; 10:28AM; 1832 S Arlington Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3PZWMv5; Arlington Heights; Two story, craftsman style home with fire showing from the 1st floor. Firefighters are in the offensive mode. Additional resources requested (not reflected in this alert).; FS 26; Batt 11; Central Bureau; Council District 10; BC11 E15 E229 E34 RA34 SQ21 T29; CH9; 13; Margaret Stewart

title.a: Update Traffic Collision with Entrapment 12/27/2022 INC#1018

item.description: Update Traffic Collision with Entrapment; INC#1018; 04:30PM; SB 405 Fwy x Roscoe Blvd Offramp; MAP: https://bit.ly/3hRTugW; #NorthHills; The adult male, who proved to be the only patient, has been freed from the wreckage, and is being transported by LAFD Paramedics to a regional trauma center in serious condition. No further details. Media Inquiries: CHP West Valley Log #1733.; FS 90; Batt 10; Valley Bureau; Council District 6; BC10 E290 E7 E75 E90 EM15 HR3 RA7 RA81 T90 UR88; CH8; 18; Brian Humphrey
